Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo.level

Class LevelView

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.level.LevelView
Direct Known Subclasses:
LevelViewLevelOne, LevelViewLevelThree, LevelViewLevelTwo
public class LevelView extends Object
Responsible for displaying the UI elements in the level.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    LevelView(javafx.scene.Group root, int heartsToDisplay, int totalEnemiesPerTime)
    Constructs a LevelView object with the specified root group, hearts to display, and total enemies per time.

  • Constructor Details

    • LevelView

      public LevelView(javafx.scene.Group root, int heartsToDisplay, int totalEnemiesPerTime)
      Constructs a LevelView object with the specified root group, hearts to display, and total enemies per time.
      Parameters:
      root - the root group for the level view
      heartsToDisplay - the number of hearts to display
      totalEnemiesPerTime - the total number of enemies per time

  • Method Details

      Initializes the explosion pool by creating and adding explosion images to the root group.

      Initializes the warning pool by creating and adding warning images to the root group.

      Displays the heart display on the root group.

      Displays the win image on the root group.

      Displays the game over image on the root group.

    • removeHearts

      public void removeHearts(int heartsRemaining)
      Removes hearts from the heart display based on the remaining hearts.
      Parameters:
      heartsRemaining - the number of hearts remaining

    • showExplosion

      public void showExplosion(ActiveActorDestructible enemy)
      Displays an explosion at the location of the specified enemy.
      Parameters:
      enemy - the enemy at whose location the explosion is displayed

    • showWarning

      Displays a warning at the location of the specified enemy.
      Parameters:
      enemy - the enemy at whose location the warning is displayed

      public void hideWarning(ActiveActorDestructible enemy)
      Hides the warning for the specified enemy.
      Parameters:
      enemy - the enemy for which the warning is hidden
